alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 03 at 3:13PM PDT until April 04 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
